text: Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumazir kaba, kamaghɨn Jabesian akam inigha izir gumazibav gei, “Ia ua Jabesɨn mangɨ kamaghɨn uan gumazamizibav mɨkɨm: E gurumɨn aruemɨn, izɨ ian akuragh ian apanibar gɨntɨgham.” Ezɨ Jabesian akam inigha izir gumazir kaba ghua akar kamɨn gun uan gumazamizibav geima, me oregha bar akonge.
